description: For your urban look: the 3850 HS Hooded Jacket Men with Mammut Connect is a lightweight and comfortable Gore-Tex® hard shell jacket capable of withstanding light showers in any situation. Mammut Georganic 3D Technology makes the jacket feel very comfortable and provides freedom of movement. A ventilation zone on the back also ensures a pleasant internal temperature.
name: Mammut 3850 HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
